|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "0500-2540411000" and "1436" (09/2014) is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [http://www.u-media.com.tw/content/product/Wi-Fi.php ''U-MEDIA''] WST-C41L N02 R1.0 (see also [[U-MEDIA WST-385L|WST-385L]])
{{WiFiCert|WFA53443|06/26/2014}} {{see also|Linksys RE6500HG|U-MEDIA}}
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/re6500 ''Linksys RE6500'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] (PCB images)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32516-linksys-re6500-ac1200-max-wi-fi-range-extender-reviewed?start=1 ''Linksys RE6500 AC1200 MAX Wi-Fi Range Extender'' on '''SNB'''] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz [[MIPS32|MIPS 1004Kc]] :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L6406E 8MB (SPI SOP8) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWQD (64MB DDR2) :WLAN 2.4GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7602E 2T2R 802.11bgn :WLAN 5GHz: [[MediaTek]] MT7612E 2T2R 802.11ac :Audio: ''Wolfson'' [http://www.wolfsonmicro.com/products/audio-hubs-%28codecs%29/stereo-low-power-codecs/wm8960/ WM8960] Audio Hub (Codec)
